mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_orderlist (order_idx, pro_idx, amount) VALUES (#{order_idx}, #{pro_idx}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT o.idx, o.total_price, u.point AS user_point FROM T_order o JOIN T_user u ON o.useridx = u.idx WHERE o.idx = #{order_idx}
SELECT ol.idx, ol.pro_idx, ol.amount, p.title, p.ani_title, p.thumImg, p.price FROM T_orderlist ol JOIN T_product p ON ol.pro_idx = p.idx WHERE ol.order_idx = #{order_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_payment (orderId, amount, customerName, order_idx) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{amount}, #{customerName}, #{order_idx})
